column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Improve Your Thinking Skills
#Text=Having trouble with your thinking skills ?
#Text=Here are some tips to improve your thinking skills .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Take some breathing exercises .
#Text=The best way to breath is to take it from your belly .
#Text=Many people do not know this mode of breathing .
#Text=Take several slow breaths from your belly .
#Text=Stomach breathing activates your brain .
#Text=It helps you to improve your thinking skills and memory .
#Text=Deep breathing also increases the oxygen flow to your brain cells .
#Text=As a result they become more active .
#Text=Studies also have shown that Chewing gum also can help you improve you thinking skills .
#Text=The act of chewing gum increases the flow of blood to your brain .
#Text=People chewing gum are able to concentrate better and remember new information better .
#Text=It is good to use sugar free gum to avoid any side effects .
#Text=You can also try arm circles .
#Text=It is good to go to a place where no one can see you .
#Text=It is enough to do 10-15 set of arm circles .
#Text=To do an arm circle , just extend your arm straight out to the front .
#Text=Then swing your arm all the way behind you and back to the front .
#Text=Always keep your elbow blocked while performing these exercises .
#Text=It will increase you heart rate which is considered good for your brain .
#Text=Make use of some brain games .
#Text=Puzzles and brainteasers force your mind to get in active mode .
#Text=The various types like crossword puzzles , Sudoku , etc can be made use of for this purpose .
#Text=Drink enough water .
#Text=Do n't go for sodas , colas or coffee .
#Text=Do n't eat chocolate or sweets .
#Text=They 'll decrease your ability to concentrate and remember things .
#Text=It is said that many people are dehydrated all the time and do n't realize it .
#Text=Your brain is easily affected by it .
#Text=Therefore , make sure that you drink enough water .
#Text=Having too much food that contains fat or sugar will badly affect your thinking skills .
#Text=Taking not meals can make you tired .
#Text=Therefore , eat a small , balanced meal .
#Text=Include foods that help the brain operate well , such as fish , vegetables , and whole grains .
#Text=When you are trying to study try using all the senses .
#Text=The different parts of your brain remember different sense impressions .
#Text=For example images are stored in one area and sounds in another .
#Text=When you study new information , set a timer .
#Text=Allot only a specific amount of time to learn the material .
#Text=You can again subdivide them .
#Text=Maybe something like this , 10 minutes to read , 20 minutes to review and 10 minute to recite .
#Text=It will force you to focus because you know that your time is limited .
#Text=Tips
#Text=As said before puzzles can be really helpful .
#Text=They force you to think of something very deeply .
#Text=They make you brain work .
#Text=They bring out all the reasoning ability in you .
#Text=Try to buy a book of puzzles to have better practice .
#Text=If you get better sleep you 'll be able to think better .
#Text=Meditation can be helpful to think better .
#Text=Start with 5 minutes in the morning and five minutes before bed , every day .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Seek to succeed rather than entertaining thoughts of failure .
